title: How biogas can reduce India's dependency on fossil fuels and lower energy costs?
description: India, the world's third-largest energy consumer, is exploring biogas as a sustainable alternative to fossil fuels. Biogas can reduce energy costs, improve waste management, and lower greenhouse gas emissions. Government initiatives aim to boost biogas production, contributing to energy security and environmental sustainability.
